title: GetMessage2 (Method)
text:
METHOD GetMessage2 : CharBufferPtr
Returns a message text, that has been configured for the alarm.
Please remark: This function is accessing localization information and is therefore not recommended for calls from realtime tasks

rows.Name: stringType
rows.Comment:
A __SYSTEM.TYPE_CLASS indicating, which type of string has
to be retrieved

rows:
The 1-based index of the message text.
If this parameter is 1 then the return value will be the return value of method GetMessage.
For all greater parameter values the additional message texts will be returned
